item.title: What I :heart: About Server Side Swift
item.description: I should preface with, I’m a contributor Vapor, the leading server side Swift framework. However, this is an attempt to be objective about Swift on the server I first got involved with server side Swift just as Vapor 3 was in alpha. I was looking for a statically typed language that was just nice to use. I’d played around with iOS before and I generally liked Swift, but my domain was definitely full stack web/api.
